backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types and initial data for books, journals, user profiles, sessions, and rituals.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components used in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Provides step-by-step instructions for redeploying the app without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures with structured triage steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up root container, favicon, environment shim, and global error handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider, error boundary, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel component for selecting ambient sounds with swipe navigation, audio playback, and volume control.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors, logs them, and displays a detailed error screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner showing cloud sync or loading errors with retry behavior tailored to error type.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based duration input component allowing users to select a time range in minutes.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation bar with animated icons and hover labels that routes to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide‑out menu providing theme switching, authentication status, and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Dropdown filter UI for journal entries supporting mood, energy, date range, favorites, and text filtering.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Swipeable and keyboard-navigable pager for knowledge book content with animated transitions and auto-scroll.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system that animates chaotic or coherent particle motion depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Animated lotus canvas with particle effects and theme‑adjusted glow and pulse visuals.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel showing meditation types with swipe and circular navigation plus animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step‑by‑step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and parsed benefits section.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular timer ring with animated wave effects, theme‑based colors, and glow at the progress edge.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component showing vertical wave‑animated fill inside a circular clipping region based on progress and theme.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile‑only back button that navigates to the dashboard and optionally calls a custom handler.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper that renders a full‑screen background with a LotusCanvas effect behind page content.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas‑drawn bowl graphic that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus model and particle system whose growth and animation depend on total meditation minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus with animated breathing, glow, and petal openness driven by growth model, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi‑step quiz dialog that collects user answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that shows up to five saved rituals and lets users start or delete one, with a fallback message when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel for browsing, starting, or deleting rituals with swipe, navigation, and confirmation dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays user session state and provides guest return or authenticated logout functionality.
Navigation bar with session indicator, theme toggle, back button, and mobile menu integration.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wrapper rendering a themed Toaster component with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing retryable cloud write operations using current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity initialization states.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable meditation timer hook with start, pause, reset, seek, and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls and local guest fallbacks in React Query hooks for books, profiles, journal entries, and other app data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, themes, animations, and typography for the frontend.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured educational content and quiz data for different meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Interactive book recommendation viewer with swipe navigation and dynamic card positioning.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing quotes, meditation carousel, and ritual management with navigation to sessions.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal interface for filtering, editing, favoriting, importing, and exporting meditation reflections.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge library with category selection, scroll handling, and per-technique quiz tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling authentication, theming, and entry into guest or authenticated dashboard flow.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page for configuring a meditation session with timers, ambient sounds, guides, mood/energy inputs, and session saving.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays progress stats and handles import/export of user data with cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for reflection content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for stats content.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to fetch sounds by ID or path.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Maps backend cloud sync errors to user-friendly messages and classifies error types.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations with readiness and authorization checks.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Serializes and validates meditation-related data for safe JSON export/import handling.
Manages storing and retrieving quiz scores per user or guest using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visuals over 0–20,000 minutes using phased thresholds and smooth interpolation to produce petal, layer, and particle parameters.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based guest journaling and progress management with legacy migration and CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, mapping aliases and defaults to supported enum values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and utilities for determining current, next, and display-ready ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata containing current issues, implemented features, and configuration for the Meditation App.
